controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double[][] totalDPS 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(FileHandling fh)
      Default constructor for Controller Desired parse styles Long term average - current configuration Short term burst - can add levels to flip between long and short Class selection settings - preconfigured attack levels for all melee classes Melee parsing 1 current configuration Caster parsing - 2 Defensive parsing - 3 Threat parsing - 4

      • setArrows

        public void setArrows(int arrowDamage,
                      int arrowElementalDamage,
                      int arrowElementalType)
        Setter method to set arrow damage
        Parameters:
        arrowDamage - base damage of the arrow
        arrowElementalDamage - elemental damage of the arrow
        arrowElementalType - Spell resist types 12345 mr fr cr pr dr

      • setBerserkAndAA

        public void setBerserkAndAA(int ambidexterity,
                            int combatFury,
                            int archeryMastery,
                            int spellCastingFury,
                            int flurry,
                            boolean berserk)
        Parameters:
        ambidexterity - adds 32 DW skill when AA is active (set to 1 for no bonus)
        combatFury - Combat Fury 1 2 3: 15, 40, 75. FotA1 2 3: 100, 125, 150
        archeryMastery - Ranger archery mastery AA 1 2 3
        spellCastingFury - caster spell crit AA r1 2 3
        flurry - Warrior Flurry AA r1 2 3: 7%, 11%, 15%
        berserk - Warrior low health berserk true/false
